name: invoicely
description: **Invoicely** is a full-stack, AI-powered invoice management web application built to simplify and automate the invoicing process for freelancers, entrepreneurs, and small-to-medium businesses. It combines modern design, real-time analytics, and smart AI assistance to deliver a complete business invoicing experience.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
